name: Lonely Echo
description:
CONTENT WARNING: FLASHING LIGHTS. This game contains a lot of flashing lights so if you suffer from photosensitive epilepsy then we don't recommend to play this game.

A short game about a blind person that has survived a car crash and must find themselves some help to return to society. Make your way through the forest using echolocation to observe the surroundings and watch out for dangers.

This game was made during the Autumn semester of our second year from the topic Serious Games and we decided in the direction of blindness awareness and the special ability certain blind people possess to help them navigate the world.
